name: Explosive Pancakes
description:
Greetings!

Explosive Pancakes is a goofy action game with a pinch of puzzle elements starring a couple of conjoined twins running a pancake shop that serves its customers explosive pancakes.

The game was made in two days, in GMTK Game Jam 2021, hosted by Game Maker's Toolkit.

 

Caution!

There is no end screen in the uploaded version, and it lacks certain sound effects. After voting for the GMTK game jam ends, the .zip file will be updated!

 

Summary

In order to beat the game, you need to both make your brain and hands work fast. The screen is divided into two parts and they each have a separate challenge!

On the right side, you need to follow the cooking level of pancakes. Take them out of the pans in time and toss them to the other twin!

On the left side, your pancakes land on funnels and then continue their way to the customers. You need to make sure to create correct connections between the funnels to deliver delicious explosive pancakes!

 

Controls

Navigation: LMB

Pick/Toss: LMB/Mouse Displacement

Pause: P

 

Credits

Ata Deniz Oktay - Game Design & Programming

Marius Wittmeier - Programming

Brody Foster - Programming

Côme Pasteau - Sound Design

Ron Rosenberg - Pixel Art

Alberto Garcia - Pixel Art
